alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 16 at 5:58AM AKDT until March 16 at 11:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW FOLLOWED BY HEAVY RAIN FOR SOUTHEAST ALASKA... .Snow continues to fall over the northern Panhandle this morning. Heavy snow over the far northern Panhandle will last well into Thursday, especially at higher elevations and along the Klondike and Haines Highways. For those along the Icy Strait corridor, temperatures have warmed enough through the evening and overnight for the transition to all rain to occur. For Yakutat, the main plume of moisture will shift to the west with significant snow accumulations expected Friday afternoon into Friday night. There is still a bit of uncertainty as to where the heaviest plume of moisture will track and whether surface temperatures will remain cold enough for significant accumulations. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 17 inches, with the heaviest snow along the highways. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...Until 11 PM AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A transition to rain near sea level is expected late Thursday morning with heavy snow continuing at higher elevations through Thursday night.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
